content.en: Smart grid optimization: Researchers have developed various algorithms to improve the accuracy and efficiency of state estimation in distribution systems. These algorithms utilize real-time measurements, synchronized phasor measurements, pseudo-measurements, and even customers' energy bills to estimate the state of the system. By incorporating these algorithms, it is possible to identify unexpected power injections, support coordinated voltage control strategies, monitor low-voltage distribution grids, and analyze power flows in distribution grids. These advancements in state estimation algorithms contribute to the development of smart distribution networks and improve the overall performance and reliability of the grid.
content.da: Smart grid-optimering: Forskere har udviklet forskellige algoritmer til at forbedre nøjagtigheden og effektiviteten af tilstandsvurdering i distributionssystemer. Disse algoritmer udnytter realtidsmålinger, synkroniserede fasemålinger, pseudo-målinger og endda kundernes energiregninger til at vurdere systemets tilstand. Ved at inkorporere disse algoritmer er det muligt at identificere uventede strømindsprøjtninger, understøtte koordinerede spændingskontrolstrategier, overvåge lavspændingsdistributionsnet og analysere strømflows i distributionsnet. Disse fremskridt inden for tilstandsvurderingsalgoritmer bidrager til udviklingen af smarte distributionsnet og forbedrer netværkets samlede ydeevne og pålidelighed.
